mapper.select: SELECT m.id , m.name , IFNULL(m.birthDt, '') birthDt , d.degree FROM member m JOIN degree d ON m.degreeFk = d.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%');
SELECT id , degree FROM degree ORDER BY CAST(id AS UNSIGNED) DESC;

SELECT m.id, m.name, CASE WHEN ad.grade = 60 THEN '회원' WHEN ad.grade = 50 THEN '회원' WHEN ad.grade = 40 THEN '매니저' WHEN ad.grade = 30 THEN '운영진' WHEN ad.grade = 20 THEN '부회장' WHEN ad.grade = 10 THEN '회장' ELSE '회원' END AS grade, d.degree, l.level, l.color, COUNT(m.id) AS count_last_1_year, COUNT( CASE WHEN me.hostDt >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) THEN 1 END ) AS count_last_3_months , IFNULL(ad.grade, 70) unsignedGrade FROM member m LEFT JOIN admin ad ON m.id = ad.memberFK JOIN level l ON m.levelFK = l.id JOIN degree d ON m.degreeFK = d.id LEFT JOIN attend at ON m.id = at.memberFK LEFT JOIN meeting me ON at.meetingFK = me.id AND me.hostDt >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR) WHERE me.hostDt >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR) AND m.id != 'TCN0' AND m.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND m.degreeFK = #{degreeFk} GROUP BY m.id, m.name, ad.grade, d.degree, l.level, l.color ORDER BY unsignedGrade ASC, d.id ASC;
